title: LF Players for 5's team
body:
B1-G1 
Looking for a Top, Jungle and a ADC 
Play most nights, Discord is a must. 

Add me or Leave a comment :)

replies.body:
Hi,I can play Adc and Support 

In Order of best champs

Adc:Tristana and Lucian (Lucian isn't my best), Wanna learn a heap more.

Support:Zyra, BlitzCrank and in the process of learning Sona.

Would Gladly Accept whichever position I would be put in.

IGN: ShadowAquarius.

Also Have Discord.

s5
play most nights and i have discord. 

ADC main mostly

ign: feminist fanboy
